nodes.text: Star Wars Master Models: Scenes is a paper-craft-model art kit that allows readers to recreate replicas of three scenes from the Star Wars saga: the Battle of Yavin, Duel on Mustafar, and the lightsaber fight on Starkiller Base. The kit includes the reference book Star Wars: Behind the Scenes Stories and Build-a-Scene Instructions, written by Benjamin Harper. It was published by becker&mayer! books on October 10, 2017.
